basics.name: Virgilio Olivardía
basics.label: Strategic planning, innovation, project management, information security, business continuity and software development.
basics.summary: I have experience implementing IT projects and business projects performing roles of strategic planning, innovation, project management, information security, business continuity and developing applications. I have done successful project implementations in government agencies and private companies.  I have managed direct reports and I supported them in their professional development.

Senior consultant and information system’s manager

references.name: Julio Escobar
references.reference: He trabajado con Virgilio por más de 10 años, primero en Senacyt, en un proyecto de tecnología de punta, y luego en Centauri Technologies.   Es un profesional de primera, altamente capaz, dedicado, responsable, ético, siempre queriendo avanzar.  Tiene múltiples habilidades, desde comprensión y creatividad tecnológica, hasta manejo de proyectos y aplomo ejecutivo.  Acepta retos fuertes y es tenaz.   Sabe adaptarse.  Virgilio y yo seguimos en contacto y con gusto puedo recomendarlo en más detalle.

references.name: Eli Faskha
references.reference: Virgilio was a consultant with CAPATEC and the Panama Digital Hub strategy. He was an integral part of the team, and had many insights on how to better the strategy. He had great time management and presentation skills, and helped with high-level relationships in the public and private sector. He was able to keep the project schedule on time, and was very professional in all of his engagements with us. Looking forward to working with him again in the future.

references.name: Alice Puga
references.reference: Virgilio es un gran profesional, responsable, organizado y comprometido, con amplia experiencia en desarrollo de sistemas, gestión de proyectos e innovación.

references.name: Reinaldo N. Mayol
references.reference: Conocí a Virgilio mientras ambos trabajabamos en la misma empresa. Siempre se caracterizó por ser una persona extremadamente organizada, activa, confiable y con ideas emprendedoras. Es un placer para mi escribir esta pequeña recomendación.

references.name: Maria Esperanza Vargas
references.reference: Trabajar con Virgilio siempre nos dio la tranquilidad de tener como asesor a un profesional con pleno dominio de su tema. Siempre demostró un alto nivel de profesionalismo, disciplina y compromiso.

references.name: Marcel Villacís Ampuero
references.reference: Virgilio es un profesional de alto nivel, muy comprometido con sus responsabilidades y enfocado en generar entregables de valor para la organización. Virgilio es una persona con valores, inteligente y buen conversador.

references.name: Oren Yosifon
references.reference:
I'd recommend Virgilio both as a professional and as a person. Virgilio was a Project Manager for Senacyt at the time we worked together.

Virgilio demonstrated invaluable capacity to grasp complex technical issues as well as lead the project in the most proffessional way possible.

His commitment to the customer he represented, devoting long hours to planning, design and testing created an environment of collaboration facilitated by constant communication which helped our teams hand the best deliverables possible, on time.

Virgilio is a knowledgeable and interesting person, with great technical, presentation and management skills,as well as a special gift for playing the Guitar :-)
